name: wp-starter-theme
description: ðŸŒŠ simple wordpress starter theme by wp-env & vite

scripts.build:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development vite build && npm run press:images
scripts.build:stg: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging vite build && npm run press:images
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && npm run press:images
scripts.db:import: gzip -dfk sql/wpenv.sql.gz && npm run wp:env run cli wp db import sql/wpenv.sql && rm -f sql/wpenv.sql
scripts.db:export: npm run wp:env run cli wp db export sql/wpenv.sql; gzip -f sql/wpenv.sql
scripts.wp:restart: npm run wp:env start --update && npm run wp:env run cli 'wp rewrite flush --hard'
scripts.wp:setup: npm run wp:start && npm run db:import && npm run wp:env run cli 'wp rewrite flush --hard'
scripts.lint:check: npm run lint:html && npm run lint:style && npm run lint:es

author: HISAMI KURITA
